sortBy.description: Property to sort the results by

sortDir.description: Direction to sort the results by

streamId.description: Used to filter the Data Streams on the streamId field, (any case insensitive substring match will be returned)

limit.description: Maximum number data streams to retrieve, when left unset, all Data Streams will be returned

offset.description: Offset to begin returning Data Streams from, to be used along with limit to paginate results

includePointMappings.description: When set to true, Point Mappings associated to each Data Stream will also be included in the response
